content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 2.5)
- Lab (position 2.0, 0.0) - Currently not powered
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - No ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - No ingredients to smelt
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, 0.5) - Empty inventory

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - No ingredients to smelt
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - No ingredients to smelt

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified)
- Inserter (position not specified) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new pole
- Ensure that the first argument is a valid Prototype object before attempting to place a new pole.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Check the power supply to the lab and ensure it is connected to a power source.

### Errors when lacking ingredients for research
- Make sure to gather the required ingredients (in this case, 10 automation science packs) before attempting to complete research.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
